Strawberry_Banana_Blueberry.name: Strawberry Banana Blueberry
Strawberry_Banana_Blueberry.step_1: 1. Blend spinach, orange juice and water until smooth.
Strawberry_Banana_Blueberry.step_2: 2. Add the frozen fruits and blend again.

Pineapple_Mojito.name: Pineapple Mojito
Pineapple_Mojito.step_1: 1. Blend kale and coconut water until smooth.
Pineapple_Mojito.step_2: 2. Add remaining ingredients, and blend until smooth.

Strawberry_Peach_Refresher.name: Strawberry Peach Refresher
Strawberry_Peach_Refresher.step_1: 1. Blend bok choy and almond milk until smooth.
Strawberry_Peach_Refresher.step_2: 2. Add the remaining fruits and blend again.
